name: Invoke-Obfuscation CLIP+ Launcher
description: Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*cmd.{0,5}(?:\/c|\/r).+clip(?:\.exe)?.{0,4}&&.+clipboard]::\(\s\\\"\{\d\}.+\-f.+\"/`
